outline:
1. to spread, spread out, stretch, break in pieces
    1. (Qal)
      1. to spread out, display
      2. to spread over
    2. (Niphal) to be scattered, be spread out
    3. (Piel)
      1. to spread out
      2. to scatter
kjv_def: break, chop in pieces, lay open, scatter, spread (abroad, forth, selves, out), stretch (forth, out).
